column4: 2019 the owner of White cobra bar was found dead at his business at # 28E0
column7: Phnom Penh.------ PIERRE ALAIN PANCHAUD (AKA Pancho Cobra) of Switzerland was aged 66.------Authorities confirmed he died from lung cancer.------His body was taken to Stung Meanchey pagoda.------*Pancho was a well known
column8: much loved and respected part of the PP bar scene
column9: and also an expert on snakes. RIP.  (Main photo-Facebook
